articles.title: Ashneer Grover bought Porsche, told BharatPe staff he spent $130K on dining table: Report - Business Insider India

articles.content: Ashneer Grover, who quit fintech platform 'BharatPe' that he co-founded amid serious allegations of financial wrongdoings against him and his wife Madhuri Jain Grover, allegedly "purchased a Porsche"… [+1771 chars]
